recommendations: Mani James ( MJ ) ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Parth on a strategic engagement with Dubai Economy. Parth came across as a very hard-working and committed professional. His eye for detail and his work ethic were standout features for me. He was always enthusiastic about taking up new and challenging tasks and coming up with trumps. I am sure that he would be a great asset to any organization that he would be a part of. I have no hesitation to recommend Parth to his future employers and will highly vouch for Parth as he sets off on his career journey. Wishing him nothing but the best‚Äù

Ayush Singhal ‚ÄúParth is an extremely sharp individual and is able to consistently bring in a fresh perspective to addressing the tasks at hand. He worked with me as a product intern on a complex feature and we spent a significant amount of time in understanding every nook, cranny, edge scenario. Parth was able to quickly learn the product dynamics and adapt to the fast paced working environment. I do wish Parth all the best. He would clearly be an asset for any organization. ‚Äù
